Texts.Chs: 现在我们来做^green;瓦特酒^reset;。准备1个^orange;空玻璃瓶^reset;，1份^orange;酵母水^reset;，2个^orange;瓦特果^reset;，2份^orange;葡萄醪^reset;，使用^orange;发酵罐^reset;来开始酿造。
Texts.Eng: And now let's make some ^green;Wartwine^reset;. Combine a ^orange;Bottle^reset;, ^orange;Yeast Water^reset;, 2 ^orange;Wartweed^reset;, and 2 ^orange;Grape Mash^reset; in the ^orange;Fermenter^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 优秀！它看起来真是美味极了，不是吗？但这只是开始。你将会酿造出更棒的酒的！
Texts.Eng: Excellent! It looks tasty, doesn't it? But this is just the beginning. You'll craft even more glorious alcohol soon!
